meanings.sent1: The breeze felt coolish on my face.
meanings.sent2: The water in the pool was coolish, perfect for a swim.
meanings.sent3: She wore a coolish jacket even though it was sunny outside.
meanings.sent4: The coolish air in the mountains was refreshing after the heat of the city.
meanings.sent5: The coolish touch of the metal railing sent shivers down my spine.

meanings.definition: Moderately cool in manner or appearance.
meanings.sent1: His coolish demeanor made him seem aloof.
meanings.sent2: The actor's coolish outfit caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: She gave a coolish response to his joke, not wanting to seem too eager.
meanings.sent4: The coolish expression on her face hid her true emotions.
meanings.sent5: His coolish attitude towards the situation surprised everyone.
